meanings.definition: Walks or moves around while asleep.
meanings.sent1: At night, she somnambulates around the house, unaware of her actions.
meanings.sent2: The sleepwalker somnambulates through the dark room, avoiding obstacles.
meanings.sent3: The cat somnambulates in her sleep, dreaming of chasing mice.
meanings.sent4: His mind somnambulates through memories of the past, lost in slumber.
meanings.sent5: The ghostly figure somnambulates through the haunted mansion, haunting its halls.

meanings.definition: Moves or acts in a drowsy or sleepy manner.
meanings.sent1: After taking the medication, he somnambulates to the bed, barely awake.
meanings.sent2: The tired toddler somnambulates towards his mother, rubbing his eyes.
meanings.sent3: The sloth somnambulates slowly through the trees, in no rush.
meanings.sent4: The fog somnambulates over the lake, enveloping everything in a dreamy haze.
meanings.sent5: The old man somnambulates through the park, lost in his thoughts and memories.
